Aboutme.education02: Metropolitan University of the State of São Paulo - FAMEESP
Aboutme.education.quote: True knowledge does not elevate pride but humility. Just as full ears bow in respect to the soil that nourishes them, the wise find greatness in simplicity.
Aboutme.unesa.quote: Little knowledge makes people feel proud. Much knowledge makes them feel humble. Thus, the grainless ears arrogantly lift their heads to the sky, while the full ones bow to the earth, their mother.

experience.experience.description: From 2016 to 2024, I initially served as a Recruit, Soldier, and Corporal in the Marine Corps, facing physical and mental challenges in a variety of operations. I gained valuable lessons in leadership, resilience, and camaraderie while participating in training exercises and real missions. I was assigned to the Data Processing Sector (SPD), where I worked on maintenance and infrastructure, enhancing my technical skills and contributing to the operational efficiency of the unit.
experience.honors: I was honored with a Letter of Merit from the Brazilian Navy for my professional conduct during my service. I also received the following awards:
experience.essencia_life.description: I developed significant skills as a network administrator in my free time while gaining hands-on experience as a capsule worker.
